title: The future of fuel, and the problem with exhaust (Road trip pt. 2)
itunes:author: American Public Media
description: Our planet needs some carbon dioxide, but cars are pumping more into the atmosphere than our carbon cycle can handle. Weâ€™ll explore what all this carbon means for our planet. And we talk to a scientist who is working to change how we fuel our cars, so we can cut back on all this carbon dioxide.
